name: Maze Escape (itch) (JordyWolf, nielsduif)
description:
Maze Escape is a school project made by Tiara Vrossink, Niels Duivenvoorden and me,  Jordy Wolf.

You find yourself stuck in a randomly generated maze and to escape you must find 3 keys in order to open the exit. But there is also a creature in the maze with you. You can only see the path that is in direct line of sight. You can hear the footsteps of the creature, use this to your advantage. In the maze you can find coins to increase your score and powerups to help you. When complete a level, the maze will get bigger and more creature will traverse the maze alongside you.

Good Luck!
